entry.content:
Markdown 快速入门

Markdown的相关用法

Markdown 支持两种标题的语法，Setext 和 atx 形式。Setext 形式是用底线的形式，利用 =（最高阶标题）和- （第二阶标题），Atx 形式在行首插入 1 到 6 个 # ，对应到标题 1 到 6 阶。
区块引用则使用 email 形式的 ‘>‘ 角括号。

Markdown 语法:

<span class="hljs-type">A</span> <span class="hljs-type">First</span> <span class="hljs-type">Level</span> <span class="hljs-type">Header</span>
====================
<span class="hljs-type">A</span> <span class="hljs-type">Second</span> <span class="hljs-type">Level</span> <span class="hljs-type">Header</span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-comment"</span>>---------------------</span>

<span class="hljs-type">Now</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>is</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-property"</span>>time</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span> all good men <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>to</span> come <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>to</span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> aid <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>of</span> their country. <span class="hljs-type">This</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>is</span> just a
regular <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-property"</span>>paragraph</span>.

<span class="hljs-type">The</span> quick brown fox jumped <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>over</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">lazy</span>
dog<span class="hljs-symbol">'s</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>back</span>.
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-comment"</span>>### <span class="hljs-type">Header</span> <span class="hljs-number">3</span></span>

> <span class="hljs-type">This</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>is</span> a blockquote.
> 
> <span class="hljs-type">This</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>is</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>second</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-property"</span>>paragraph</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>in</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> blockquote.
>
> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-comment"</span>>## <span class="hljs-type">This</span> is an <span class="hljs-type">H2</span> in a blockquote</span>
`</pre>

#### 输出 <span class="hljs-type">HTML</span> 为：

<pre>`<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>h1</span>></span><span class="hljs-type">A</span> <span class="hljs-type">First</span> <span class="hljs-type">Level</span> <span class="hljs-type">Header</span><span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>h1</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>h2</span>></span><span class="hljs-type">A</span> <span class="hljs-type">Second</span> <span class="hljs-type">Level</span> <span class="hljs-type">Header</span><span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>h2</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>p</span>></span><span class="hljs-type">Now</span> is the time <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> all good men to come to
the aid of their country. <span class="hljs-type">This</span> is just a
regular paragraph.<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>p</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>p</span>></span><span class="hljs-type">The</span> quick brown fox jumped over the <span class="hljs-keyword">lazy</span>
dog<span class="hljs-symbol">'s</span> back.<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>p</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>h3</span>></span><span class="hljs-type">Header</span> <span class="hljs-number">3</span><span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>h3</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>blockquote</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>p</span>></span><span class="hljs-type">This</span> is a blockquote.<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>p</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>p</span>></span><span class="hljs-type">This</span> is the second paragraph in the blockquote.<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>p</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>><<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>h2</span>></span><span class="hljs-type">This</span> is an <span class="hljs-type">H2</span> in a blockquote<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>h2</span>></span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-tag"</span>></<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-title"</span>>blockquote</span>></span>
`</pre>

#### 效果如下：

<pre>`<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-comment"</span>># <span class="hljs-type">A</span> <span class="hljs-type">First</span> <span class="hljs-type">Level</span> <span class="hljs-type">Header</span></span>

<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-comment"</span>>## <span class="hljs-type">A</span> <span class="hljs-type">Second</span> <span class="hljs-type">Level</span> <span class="hljs-type">Header</span></span>

<span class="hljs-type">Now</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>is</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-property"</span>>time</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span> all good men <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>to</span> come <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>to</span>
<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> aid <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>of</span> their country. <span class="hljs-type">This</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>is</span> just a
regular <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-property"</span>>paragraph</span>.

<span class="hljs-type">The</span> quick brown fox jumped <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>over</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">lazy</span>
dog<span class="hljs-symbol">'s</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>back</span>.

<span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-comment"</span>>### <span class="hljs-type">Header</span> <span class="hljs-number">3</span></span>

> <span class="hljs-type">This</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>is</span> a blockquote.
`</pre>> <pre>`<span class="hljs-type">This</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>is</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>second</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-property"</span>>paragraph</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>in</span> <span <span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span>=</span><span class="hljs-string">"hljs-keyword"</span>>the</span> blockquote.
`</pre>> <pre>`<span <span class="hljs-type">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"hljs-comment"</span>><span class="hljs-comment">## This is an H2 in a blockquote</span></span>

`</pre>
<pre>`<span <span class="hljs-type">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"hljs-preprocessor"</span>><span class="hljs-comment">## 修辞和强调</span></span>
`</pre>
<pre>`<span class="xml">Markdown 使用星号和底线来标记需要强调的区段。

<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-preprocessor"</span>></span>#### Markdown语法：<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>

<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">pre</span>></span>`Some <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-operator"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>of<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> these <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-keyword"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>words<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> *are emphasized*.
Some <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-operator"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>of<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> these <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-keyword"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>words<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-title"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>_are<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> emphasized also_.
Use <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-constant"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>two<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> asterisks <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-keyword"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>for<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> **strong emphasis**.
Or, <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-keyword"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>if<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> you prefer, __use <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-constant"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>two<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span> underscores instead__.
`<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">pre</span>></span>

<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-preprocessor"</span>></span>#### 输出 HTML 为:<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>

class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-title"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>li<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-tag"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"><<<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-title"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>li<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>Booze.<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-tag"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"></<<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-title"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>li<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-tag"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"></<<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span>class<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>=<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-string"</span>></span>"hljs-title"<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>>ul<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span>
`<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">pre</span>></span>

<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-preprocessor"</span>></span>##### 效果均为如下所示：<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">span</span>></span></span>
  • Candy.
  • Gum.

  • Booze.

    当混合用时间距会有差异，如：

    <pre><span class="hljs-bullet">+ </span>Apple. <span class="hljs-bullet">* </span>Banana. <span class="hljs-bullet">- </span>Gum. <span class="hljs-bullet">- </span>Booze.</pre>

    效果如下：

  • Apple.

  • Banana.

  • Gum.

  • Booze.

    有序列表

    使用一般的数字接着一个英文句点作为项目标记：

    <pre><span class="hljs-bullet">1. </span>Red <span class="hljs-bullet">2. </span>Green <span class="hljs-bullet">3. </span>Blue</pre>

    输出 HTML 为：

    <pre><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">ol</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span>Red<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span>Green<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span>Blue<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">ol</span>></span></pre>

    效果如下：
  1. Red
  2. Green

  3. Blue

    如果你在项目之间插入空行，那项目的内容会用 <p> 包起来，你也可以在一个项目内放上多个段落，只要在它前面缩排 4 个空白或 1 个 tab 。

    <pre>`* A list item.
    With multiple paragraphs.

    * Another <span class="hljs-property">item</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">the</span> <span class="hljs-type">list</span>.`</pre>
    输出 HTML 为：

    <pre><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">ul</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">p</span>></span>A list item.<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">p</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">p</span>></span>With multiple paragraphs.<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">p</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">p</span>></span>Another item in the list.<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">p</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">li</span>></span> <span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">ul</span>></span></pre>

    效果如下：
  • A list item.
    With multiple paragraphs.

  • Another item in the list.

    链接

    Markdown 支援两种形式的链接语法： 行内 和 参考 两种形式，两种都是使用角括号来把文字转成连结。

    行内形式 是直接在后面用括号直接接上链接：

    <pre>This is an [<span class="hljs-link_label">example link</span>](<span class="hljs-link_url">http://example.com/</span>).</pre>

    输出 HTML 为：

    <pre><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">p</span>></span>This is an <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">a</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">href</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"http://example.com/"</span>></span> example link<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">a</span>></span>.<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-title">p</span>></span></pre>

    效果如下：

    This is an example link.

    参考形式的链接让你可以为链接定一个名称，之后你可以在文件的其他地方定义该链接的内容

    <pre>`I get 10 times more traffic from [Google][1] than from
    [Yahoo][2] or [MSN][3].

    [1]: http://google.com/ “Google”
    [2]: http://search.yahoo.com/ “Yahoo Search”
    [3]: http://search.msn.com/ “MSN Search”`</pre>

    输出 HTML 为：

    <pre><p>I <span class="hljs-built_in">get</span> <span class="hljs-number">10</span> times more traffic <span class="hljs-built_in">from</span> <<span class="hljs-operator">a</span> href=<span class="hljs-string">"http://google.com/"</span> title=<span class="hljs-string">"Google"</span>>Google</<span class="hljs-operator">a</span>> than <span class="hljs-built_in">from</span> <<span class="hljs-operator">a</span> href=<span class="hljs-string">"http://search.yahoo.com/"</span> title=<span class="hljs-string">"Yahoo Search"</span>>Yahoo</<span class="hljs-operator">a</span>> <span class="hljs-operator">or</span> <<span class="hljs-operator">a</span> href=<span class="hljs-string">"http://search.msn.com/"</span> title=<span class="hljs-string">"MSN Search"</span>>MSN</<span class="hljs-operator">a</span>>.</p></pre>

    效果如下：

    I get 10 times more traffic from Google than from
    Yahoo or MSN.

    title属性 是选择性的，链接名称可以用字母、数字和空格，但是不分大小写：

    <pre>`I start my morning with a cup of coffee and
    [The New York Times][NY Times].

    [ny times]: http://www.nytimes.com/`</pre>

    输出 HTML 为：

    <pre><p>I start my morning <span class="hljs-operator">with</span> <span class="hljs-operator">a</span> cup <span class="hljs-operator">of</span> coffee <span class="hljs-operator">and</span> <<span class="hljs-operator">a</span> href=<span class="hljs-string">"http://www.nytimes.com/"</span>>The New York Times</<span class="hljs-operator">a</span>>.</p></pre>

    效果如下：

    I start my morning with a cup of coffee and
    The New York Times.

    ·图片

    图片的语法和链接很像。

    行内形式（title 是选择性的）：

    <pre>![<span class="hljs-link_label">alt text</span>](<span class="hljs-link_url">/path/to/img.jpg "Title"</span>)</pre>

    参考形式：

    <pre>`![<span class=”hljs-link_label”>alt text</span>][<span class=”hljs-link_reference”>id</span>]

    [<span class=”hljs-link_reference”>id</span>]:<span class=”hljs-link_url”> /path/to/img.jpg “Title”</span>

上面两种方法都会输出 HTML 为：
entry.summary: Markdown 快速入门
